cs.DC, cs.PL, cs.DS, cs.SE, cs.SY. 

The paper discusses the actor model, which is commonly used in distributed systems and falls under the category of Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC). The paper also focuses on snapshotting, which is a programming language concept and falls under the category of Programming Languages (cs.PL). The paper proposes a solution that involves capturing partial heaps, which is a data structure concept and falls under the category of Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS). The paper also discusses the impact of snapshotting on request latency, which is a software engineering concern and falls under the category of Software Engineering (cs.SE). Finally, the paper proposes a solution that enables new deployment and debugging options for actor systems, which is a systems engineering concern and falls under the category of Systems and Control (cs.SY).
